      • waitForWindow

        public static Window waitForWindow(UI ui,
                                   java.lang.String windowName,
                                   long timeout)
        Wait for a window with a specific name to appear
        Parameters:
        windowName - Name of the window
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds to wait for the window to appear
        Returns:
        Returns the window or null if not found

      • waitForWindow

                                   java.lang.String windowName)
        Wait for a window with a specific name to appear
        Parameters:
        windowName - Name of the window
        Returns:
        Returns the window or null if not found

      • waitForWindowClose

        public static boolean waitForWindowClose(UI ui,
                                         java.lang.String windowName,
                                         long timeout)
        Wait for a window with a specific name to disappear
        Parameters:
        timeout - in milliseconds
        windowName - Name of the window
        Returns:
        false if the window did not close before the timeout (it may or may not still close in the future)

        Tries to find an inventory attached to the given window, such as cupboard
        Parameters:
        window - Window to look inventory from
        Returns:
        Inventory of the window or null if not found

      • getInventories

        public static java.util.ArrayList<PBotInventory> getInventories(Window window)
        Tries to find an inventories attached to the given window, such as cupboard
        Parameters:
        window - Window to check for inventories
        Returns:
        List of inventories of the window, empty if not found

      • getStockpileTotalCapacity

        public static int getStockpileTotalCapacity(UI ui)
        Returns total capacity of the stockpile window which is currently open
        Returns:
        Total capacity, or -1 if stockpile window could not be found

      • getStockpileUsedCapacity

        public static int getStockpileUsedCapacity(UI ui)
        Returns used capacity of the stockpile window which is currently open
        Returns:
        Used capacity, or -1 if stockpile window could not be found

      • getAmount

        public static int getAmount(Window window)
        Get amount at a meter of the window, from 0 to 100, for example, a trough
        Returns:
        Meter amount, -1 if not meter found

      • getAmounts

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getAmounts(Window window)
        Get amounts of meters of the window, from 0 to 100, some windows may have more than 1 meter, like chicken coops
        Returns:
        List containing amounts of the meters that were found

      • getTooltips

        Get tooltips of widgets in the window Example: Trough
        Parameters:
        window - Window to check for tooltips
        Returns:
        List containing the tooltips that were found
